title: 1  Vector
text:
1.2 Atomic Vectors

logical
numeric: integer, double
character


1.2.1 Scalar

lgl_var <- c(TRUE, FALSE)
int_var <- c(1L, 6L, 10L)
dbl_var <- c(1, 2.5, 4.5)
chr_var <- c("these are", "some strings")


typeof(lgl_var)
#> [1] "logical"
typeof(int_var)
#> [1] "integer"
typeof(dbl_var)
#> [1] "double"
typeof(chr_var)
#> [1] "character"



1.2.2 Longer Vector

c(c(1, 2), c(3, 4))
#> [1] 1 2 3 4



1.2.3 Missing Value
NA will propagate except

NA ^ 0
#> [1] 1

NA | TRUE
#> [1] TRUE

NA & FALSE
#> [1] FALSE
